name: Waves 1.0
description: This artwork uses Perlin noise to create multiple waves with color gradient in between.

name: Waves 2.0
description: For this work, I took the same idea with waves but decided to add more depth by adding multiple overlapping layers with decreasing opacity to create a sense of depth.

name: The Sound 3.0
description: I continued experimanting with waves and this time added motion to the art piece. I wanted to immitate the sound waves that shange as the sound changes.

name: Windows 1.0
description: This work was inspired by Vera Moln√°r's Computer rosace-series (1974) artwork. I put multiple rectangles to the grid and played with opacity to create a fading effect closer to the middle of every rectangle to add more volume to the art piece.

name: Geometric flowers 2.0
description: This work also uses rectangles and grid, but this time I added colors and rotation, making each rectangle seem like a geometric flower.

name: Flower field 3.0
description: For this artwork, I made a grid of animated rectangles that change size and switch colors over time.
